caption: Finding
description: Finding events report findings, detections, and possible resolutions of malware, anomalies, or actions performed by security products.
name: finding

1.caption: Create
1.description: A new security finding has been created.

2.caption: Update
2.description: An existing security finding has been updated.

3.caption: Close
3.description: A security finding has been resolved and closed.

end_time.description: The time of the most recent event included in the finding.

src_url.description: The URL pointing to the source of the finding.

start_time.description: The time of the least recent event included in the finding.

state.description: The state text, normalized to the caption of the state_id value. In the case of Other, it is defined by the data source.

1.caption: New
1.description: The service desk has received the finding but has not assigned it to an agent.

2.caption: In Progress
2.description: The finding has been assigned to an agent but has not been resolved. The agent is actively working with the user to diagnose and resolve the finding.

3.caption: On Hold
3.description: The finding requires some information or response from the user or from a third party.

4.caption: Resolved
4.description: The service desk has confirmed that the finding is resolved.

5.caption: Closed
5.description: The finding is resolved and no further action is necessary.

user.description: The user that created or modified the finding.
